epics.title: Centralized Offer Recommendation Engine (Choice API)
epics.description: Develop and deploy a centralized, rule-based offer recommendation engine (Choice API) to unify customer offers across all HDFC Bank digital assets. This engine will provide personalized, consistent, and scalable recommendations, supporting both batch and real-time delivery. Business justification: Enables single source of truth, reduces fragmentation, and increases customer engagement.

stories.title: Design Rule-Based Recommendation Engine
stories.description: Architect and design a scalable, rule-based engine for personalized offer recommendations, supporting ETB/NTB segmentation, fatigue factor, and merchant filtering.
acceptance_criteria: Design document reviewed and approved by stakeholders
Supports fatigue factor and repeat capping
Supports merchant and card type filtering

subtasks.title: Draft Engine Architecture
subtasks.description: Create high-level architecture diagram and component breakdown for the recommendation engine.

subtasks.title: Define Rule Logic
subtasks.description: Document business rules for ETB/NTB, fatigue, merchant filtering, and card type mapping.

subtasks.title: Stakeholder Review
subtasks.description: Present design to stakeholders and incorporate feedback.

subtasks.title: Finalize Design Documentation
subtasks.description: Publish final design document with all required details.

stories.title: Develop Choice API Backend
stories.description: Implement the backend services for the Choice API, including endpoints for real-time and batch recommendations, rule engine integration, and customer identifier handling.
acceptance_criteria: API endpoints for real-time and batch recommendations implemented
Supports hashed mobile number as unique identifier

subtasks.title: Set Up API Framework
subtasks.description: Initialize backend project and set up API framework with required dependencies.

subtasks.title: Implement Real-Time Recommendation Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop endpoint for real-time offer recommendations.

subtasks.title: Implement Batch Recommendation Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop endpoint for batch-based recommendations.

subtasks.title: Integrate Rule Engine
subtasks.description: Integrate rule engine logic with API endpoints.

subtasks.title: Unit and Integration Testing
subtasks.description: Write and execute unit and integration tests for all endpoints.

stories.title: API Security and Whitelisting
stories.description: Implement API security measures, including whitelisting between Crayon Data and R360, and ensure encrypted data transfer.

subtasks.title: Configure API Whitelisting
subtasks.description: Set up IP whitelisting between Crayon Data and R360 environments.

subtasks.title: Implement Encrypted Transfer
subtasks.description: Ensure all API traffic is encrypted using TLS/SSL.

subtasks.title: Document Security Measures
subtasks.description: Create documentation for all security configurations and protocols.

stories.title: Performance and Scalability Testing
stories.description: Test the Choice API for performance and scalability to support 10M API calls/month (MVP1) and plan for 40M/month.
acceptance_criteria: Load testing completed for 10M API calls/month

subtasks.title: Set Up Load Testing Tools
subtasks.description: Configure and deploy load testing tools for API endpoints.

subtasks.title: Execute Load Tests
subtasks.description: Run load tests simulating 10M API calls/month.

subtasks.title: Analyze and Optimize
subtasks.description: Analyze results, identify bottlenecks, and optimize API performance.

epics.title: Offer Management Portal (OMP) Development
epics.description: Build a centralized Offer Management Portal for onboarding, approval, and management of offers. Includes maker-checker flows, offer ingestion, and support for multiple offer categories. Business justification: Streamlines offer onboarding, ensures compliance, and supports business agility.

stories.title: Design OMP User Interface
stories.description: Design the UI/UX for the Offer Management Portal, ensuring usability for onboarding teams and compliance with HDFC Bank branding.
acceptance_criteria: Supports offer onboarding, approval, and rejection flows

subtasks.title: Create Wireframes
subtasks.description: Develop wireframes for all OMP screens.

subtasks.title: Design UI Mockups
subtasks.description: Create high-fidelity UI mockups based on wireframes.

subtasks.title: Stakeholder Review
subtasks.description: Present designs to onboarding teams and incorporate feedback.

stories.title: Develop OMP Backend Services
stories.description: Implement backend services for offer ingestion, approval/rejection, and maker-checker flows.

subtasks.title: Implement Offer Ingestion API
subtasks.description: Develop API for ingesting offers in OMP format.

subtasks.title: Develop Maker-Checker Logic
subtasks.description: Implement maker-checker approval/rejection workflow.

subtasks.title: Set Up Audit Logging
subtasks.description: Ensure all actions are logged for compliance.

stories.title: Integrate OMP with Choice API
stories.description: Enable seamless integration between OMP and the Choice API for real-time offer updates and approvals.
acceptance_criteria: OMP updates reflected in Choice API within 5 minutes

subtasks.title: Develop Integration Layer
subtasks.description: Build middleware or direct integration between OMP and Choice API.

subtasks.title: Implement Sync Mechanism
subtasks.description: Ensure offer updates are pushed to Choice API in near real-time.

subtasks.title: Test Integration
subtasks.description: Perform end-to-end testing of OMP and Choice API integration.

stories.title: User Access Management and SSO Integration
stories.description: Implement user access controls and integrate SSO for onboarding teams and approvers.

subtasks.title: Implement Role-Based Access
subtasks.description: Develop user roles and permissions for OMP.

subtasks.title: Integrate SSO
subtasks.description: Integrate SSO for seamless user login.

subtasks.title: Document User Management
subtasks.description: Create documentation for user provisioning and deprovisioning.

epics.title: Data Engineering: CIU File Handling and Customer Identifier Management
epics.description: Establish robust processes for monthly SFTP transfer, ingestion, and validation of CIU files (parquet, up to 50GB), ensuring consistent hashed mobile number mapping and card type validation. Business justification: Accurate customer segmentation and offer personalization depend on reliable data ingestion.

stories.title: Set Up SFTP Infrastructure
stories.description: Provision and configure secure SFTP infrastructure for monthly CIU file transfers, including encryption and checksum validation.
acceptance_criteria: File transfer tested with sample data

subtasks.title: Provision SFTP Server
subtasks.description: Set up SFTP server with required storage and access controls.

subtasks.title: Configure Encryption
subtasks.description: Enable encryption for all SFTP transfers.

subtasks.title: Implement Checksum Validation
subtasks.description: Set up checksum validation for file integrity.

subtasks.title: Test File Transfer
subtasks.description: Conduct test transfer with sample CIU file.

stories.title: CIU File Ingestion and Validation Pipeline
stories.description: Develop automated pipelines for ingesting, validating, and processing CIU files, ensuring data consistency and quality.
acceptance_criteria: Data validation checks for hashed mobile number and card type
Error reporting and alerting in place

subtasks.title: Develop Ingestion Pipeline
subtasks.description: Build ETL pipeline for CIU file ingestion.

subtasks.title: Implement Data Validation
subtasks.description: Validate hashed mobile number mapping and card type consistency.

subtasks.title: Set Up Error Reporting
subtasks.description: Configure error reporting and alerting for data issues.

stories.title: Batch File Generation for Non-Smartbuy Assets
stories.description: Generate batch files with top 5 merchants/offers per customer for non-Smartbuy assets, ensuring correct formatting and delivery.
acceptance_criteria: Batch files generated in required format

subtasks.title: Develop Batch File Generator
subtasks.description: Implement logic to generate batch files for non-Smartbuy assets.

subtasks.title: Format and Validate Output
subtasks.description: Ensure output files meet required format and validation criteria.

subtasks.title: Coordinate Delivery
subtasks.description: Deliver files to relevant asset-owning teams and confirm receipt.

epics.title: Frontend Integration and User Experience
epics.description: Integrate Choice API with Smartbuy and other digital assets, ensuring seamless SSO, consistent UI, and interaction capture (like/dislike, bookmark, views). Business justification: Delivers unified, personalized customer experience and increases engagement.

stories.title: Integrate Choice API with Smartbuy Frontend
stories.description: Connect Smartbuy frontend (R360) with Choice API for real-time offer recommendations and interaction capture.
acceptance_criteria: Smartbuy frontend displays personalized offers from Choice API

subtasks.title: Implement API Integration
subtasks.description: Connect frontend to Choice API endpoints.

subtasks.title: Develop Interaction Capture Logic
subtasks.description: Implement logic for capturing user interactions (like/dislike, bookmark, views).

subtasks.title: End-to-End Testing
subtasks.description: Test integration and interaction capture across all supported devices.

stories.title: Implement SSO Token-Based Redirection
stories.description: Enable seamless SSO-based redirection between digital assets for unified customer journeys.
acceptance_criteria: SSO token-based redirection functional across assets

subtasks.title: Integrate SSO SDK
subtasks.description: Integrate SSO SDK or libraries into frontend applications.

subtasks.title: Implement Token Handling
subtasks.description: Develop logic for handling SSO tokens and session management.

subtasks.title: Test Redirection Flows
subtasks.description: Test SSO redirection and session continuity across all assets.

stories.title: UI Consistency and Accessibility Review
stories.description: Ensure consistent UI and accessibility standards across all integrated digital assets.
acceptance_criteria: UI reviewed for consistency with HDFC Bank branding

subtasks.title: Conduct UI Review
subtasks.description: Review UI across all assets for consistency.

subtasks.title: Accessibility Testing
subtasks.description: Test frontend for accessibility compliance.

subtasks.title: Stakeholder Sign-Off
subtasks.description: Obtain sign-off from design and product teams.

epics.title: Compliance, Legal, and Operational Readiness
epics.description: Ensure all legal, compliance, HR, and operational requirements are met, including data privacy, regulatory checks, and cross-team coordination. Business justification: Mitigates risk, ensures regulatory compliance, and supports smooth go-live.

stories.title: Legal and Compliance Review
stories.description: Conduct legal and compliance reviews for data handling, offer management, and customer privacy.

subtasks.title: Schedule Legal Review
subtasks.description: Coordinate with legal team for review sessions.

subtasks.title: Document Compliance Requirements
subtasks.description: List and document all compliance requirements for the project.

subtasks.title: Obtain Sign-Off
subtasks.description: Secure sign-off from legal and compliance teams.

stories.title: HR and Access Approvals
stories.description: Obtain HR approvals for onboarding new team members and ensure all access rights are provisioned.
acceptance_criteria: HR approvals obtained for all new hires
Access rights provisioned for all team members

subtasks.title: Submit HR Requests
subtasks.description: Submit requests for new hires and access provisioning.

subtasks.title: Track Approvals
subtasks.description: Track and follow up on HR and access approvals.

subtasks.title: Update Documentation
subtasks.description: Update project documentation with access and HR approval details.

stories.title: Operational Runbooks and Support Handover
stories.description: Prepare operational runbooks and conduct handover sessions with IT and support teams.
acceptance_criteria: Runbooks created for all critical processes

subtasks.title: Draft Operational Runbooks
subtasks.description: Create detailed runbooks for SFTP, API, and OMP operations.

subtasks.title: Conduct Handover Sessions
subtasks.description: Organize and conduct handover sessions with IT/support teams.

subtasks.title: Obtain IT Sign-Off
subtasks.description: Secure IT team sign-off for operational readiness.

epics.title: Testing, QA, and Documentation
epics.description: Comprehensive testing (unit, integration, UAT), documentation, and code review for all components. Business justification: Ensures quality, reliability, and maintainability of the OBOP solution.

stories.title: Unit and Integration Testing
stories.description: Develop and execute unit and integration tests for backend, frontend, and data pipelines.
acceptance_criteria: All critical components covered by tests
All tests pass in CI/CD pipeline

subtasks.title: Write Unit Tests
subtasks.description: Develop unit tests for backend, frontend, and data components.

subtasks.title: Develop Integration Tests
subtasks.description: Implement integration tests for API and data flows.

subtasks.title: Configure CI/CD Test Runs
subtasks.description: Ensure all tests run in CI/CD pipeline.

stories.title: User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
stories.description: Coordinate and execute UAT with business stakeholders, onboarding teams, and asset owners.

subtasks.title: Draft UAT Plan
subtasks.description: Create detailed UAT plan with scenarios and test cases.

subtasks.title: Coordinate UAT Sessions
subtasks.description: Schedule and facilitate UAT sessions with stakeholders.

subtasks.title: Collect Feedback and Sign-Off
subtasks.description: Gather feedback, address issues, and obtain sign-off.

stories.title: Documentation and Code Review
stories.description: Prepare technical documentation and conduct code reviews for all deliverables.
acceptance_criteria: Technical documentation completed for all components
Code reviews conducted for all major features

subtasks.title: Prepare Technical Documentation
subtasks.description: Document architecture, APIs, data flows, and operational procedures.

subtasks.title: Conduct Code Reviews
subtasks.description: Organize code review sessions for all major features.

subtasks.title: Publish Documentation
subtasks.description: Publish all documentation to central repository and share with teams.
